programme.title: Mak Comblang Cantiknya Terlalu ke Selatan

programme.title: Movie - Bommayi 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Rajiv and his family move to a new house near a beach, but strange occurrences plague their children, awakening a horror that poses a threat.

programme.title: Movie - Idhu Ennoda Jilla - EP 1
programme.desc: A young man seeks revenge for his father's death but learns that violence isn't the answer. His life changes when he meets a young woman who helps him rediscover himself.

programme.title: Movie - Bharathi Kannammaa - EP 1
programme.desc: Bharathi, a worker for a zamindar, falls in love with his boss' daughter Kannamma. Their love faces obstacles due to social status, leading them to part ways. Can they live without each other?

programme.title: Movie - Vanamagan - EP 1
programme.desc: Kavya, a wealthy woman, celebrates New Year's with her friends in the Andaman Islands' restricted zone. While escaping forest officers, she accidentally hits Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Movie - 777 Charlie - EP 1
programme.desc: Dharma's life is in shambles until Charlie, a resilient abused pup, enters his world, bringing hope, redemption, and a new lease on life, transforming him forever.

programme.title: Movie - Lakshmi - EP 1
programme.desc: Maha, the family's financial pillar, marries Selvam with an agreement to support her family even after marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Dikilona - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Kgf Chapter 2 - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Adade Sundara - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - En Aaloda Seruppa Kaanom - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Ishtam - EP 1
programme.desc: When Pavan realises that his friend Anjana's teacher and his widowed father were in love with each other, he resolves to reunite them.

programme.title: Movie - Bholaa Shankar - EP 1

programme.desc: Idhyakani falls for Bindu Madhavi despite their families' rivalry. The lovers try to unite them, but their efforts lead to a conflict between the families.

programme.title: Movie - Sethupathi - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Abraham Ozler - EP 1

programme.title: Movie - Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu - EP 1

The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

programme.title: Meuh, L'epopee Des Cornes - EP 1
programme.desc: A slender body with a fatty hump, loose skin and drooping ears: the zebu is an animal of limitless capacity, perfectly adapted to extremely high temperatures. Man successfully domesticated its wild ancestor, turning it into a long-distance companion, ideal for major migrations.

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 50
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 26
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 10
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Mystery Lane - EP 26
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Interdit Aux Chiens Et Aux Italiens
programme.desc: Northern Italy, early 20th century. With life in this mountainous region having become too difficult, Luigi Ughetto crosses the Alps to France and changes his family's destiny forever. His grandson recounts his story.

programme.title: La Charge Mentale
programme.desc: In the village, word has it that Denis and Celine have a little marital problem. Feeling his virility has been attacked, Denis decides to put his name down for a wife-carrying race in the hope of regaining esteem and respect._x000D_

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 20
programme.desc: The meeting with Gisele leaves Anemone distraught. Following an unplanned visit to Jessica's, Sebastien is worried about his ex, Louis, and insists on going to see him.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 21
programme.desc: Called by her boss for an emergency, Anemone forgets what she was doing in the house, which worries her daughters. Ron, still in hospital, receives an unexpected visit. Caroline, Sebastien and Jean-Olivier learn more about their mother's past.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 14
programme.desc: Former professional wrestler, Rakesh Jain arrives in France with a special sports visa. Seduced by Paris and French culture, he quickly learns the language and becomes a yoga trainer in prestigious centers. An opportunity to illustrate the inspiring fusion of French and Indian cultures.

programme.title: A Perdre La Raison
programme.desc: Ever since childhood, Mounir has lived with Dr. Pinget, who provides him with a materially comfortable life. When the young man decides to marry Murielle and have children, the couple's dependence on the doctor becomes overwhelming. Murielle finds herself locked into a suffocating environment...

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 3
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Chateau de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: Wallis Et Futuna, Aux Frontieres De La Mer
programme.desc: In Wallis and Futuna, in the South Pacific, the sea has always provided for the needs of the inhabitants. But marine resources are dwindling, and the territory is becoming dependent on imports. The archipelago must find solutions to develop the economy while preserving local ecosystems, its culture, and its sovereignty.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 11
programme.desc: A body has been found in a state-owned forest, head and hands severed and burned. The victim being impossible to identify, Franck, the pathologist, visits the murder scene. The weapon used, discovered in the remains of the fire, is a tool used by foresters, lumberjacks and forest rangers.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 12
programme.desc: The investigation into the body found in the forest, head and hands severed and burned, takes a new turn. Franck, the pathologist, has disappeared after learning that his sister Zoe, a forest ranger, has been kidnapped. The search now concentrates on Zoe's laptop that has just been located.

programme.title: Partis Rouler - EP 8
programme.desc: Visit to one of the most beautiful mountain biking sites in Canada: the Bras-du-Nord valley, close to Quebec. The quality of its biking trail network and its sustainable tourism model make it a must.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: The taiga is the largest contiguous vegetation zone in the world. The birch plays a special role in this boreal coniferous forest. Its light-colored bark forms a perfect insulating layer. Symbiotic fungi protect its roots from attackers.

programme.title: HER Women in Asia
programme.desc: In the sporting arena, women have become increasingly more visible, scoring Olympic medals, dominating international tournaments, and often becoming celebrities and role models. In recent years, many women athletes have spoken against the injustices they face in their personal and professional lives, such as racism, harassment and sexual assault. In this edition, HER meets three such athletes.

programme.title: Close up
programme.desc: Natural disasters and wars, each seemingly more devastating than the last. Are we becoming desensitized to this constant stream of bad news? And could that actually be necessary to help us stay functional amid global conflict and the climate crisis?

programme.title: In Good Shape

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week we explore the prickly issue of land rights and reform across Africa. We hear of colonial-era land grabs in Kenya’s tea growing region, and find out how Basotho winemakers are defying the odds in turning the soil to make award-winning bottles.

programme.title: Movie - Pazhani
programme.desc: Pazhani is released from jail after serving 15 years for killing his father's mistress. In order to reconcile with his unforgiving sister, he works as a driver at her house and reforms her husband.

programme.title: Movie - Time
programme.desc: Srinivasa, who works as a painter, is engaged to Thulasi. Due to certain unfortunate events, his engagement breaks and he struggles to resolve the problems and marry her.

programme.title: Movie - Mamiyar Veedu
programme.desc: Aravind and Parthasarathy become friends in jail and continue to follow the path of crime after their release. When Aravind decides to change his lifestyle, his friend refuses to mend his ways.

programme.title: Movie - Kizhakku Veethi
programme.desc: Vedavalli is the rich and powerful landlord of the village. After a few altercations between her daughter and Ponnurasu, a villager, Vedavalli swears to ruin Ponnurasu's family.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Nesam Pudusu
programme.desc: Vasanthi moves to another town after she finds employment there as a teacher. Trouble ensues when Ranjith, a stranger, claims to be her husband, while her real husband Suresh visits the town.

programme.title: Movie - Paadu Nilave
programme.desc: When Balakrishnan, a police constable, expresses his love to a renowned singer, she rejects his advances. Balakrishnan feels insulted and decides to exact revenge on her.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Kaiya Vecha
programme.desc: Raja pretends to be a cop in order to impress the woman he loves, and she dumps him on learning the truth. When they meet again, he has a good job, but there is someone else who is in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Rojavanam
programme.desc: Muthu, an orphan, works at an old age home and loves Roja, the daughter of the owner. But she is in a dilemma as she has to marry the son of her father's friend to save the home.

programme.title: Movie - Samsaram Adhu Minsaram
programme.desc: Ammaiyappan Mudaliar fulfils every need of his four children. However, when the eldest son fights with him and leaves the house, Uma, the daughter-in-law, tries to solve their issues.

programme.title: Movie - Bose
programme.desc: Bose, a commando, gets recruited as the security head for a minister after he rescues him from kidnappers. His life takes a turn when he shoots at the same minister for molesting a girl.

programme.title: Movie - Thirumbi Paar
programme.desc: Avuthu Nayagam, a wealthy politician, remarries Vasantha, a cunning woman. She creates problems in her stepson Veeraiyan's life and tries to grab the land from the villagers at meagre rates.

programme.title: Movie - Thambi Oorukku Pudusu
programme.desc: Thambi Oorukku Pudhusu stars Anandaraj Selvaraj and Yuvarani Ravindra.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Parthal Pasu
programme.desc: A police officer helps a criminal run a brothel. When Ratna, a female policewoman, learns about this, she decides to bring him to justice with the help of her fiance, who is a lawyer.

programme.title: Movie - Kundakka Mandakka
programme.desc: Ilango aspires to get his sister married to a millionaire. For this, he tries his best to find a rich suitor, but ultimately realises that money is not everything and lets her marry the one she loves.

programme.title: Movie - En Aasa Raasave
programme.desc: When a young boy who works as a street dancer finds out that his mother is alive, he decides to locate her, and struggles to reunite his separated parents.

programme.title: Movie - Ezhaiyin Sirippil
programme.desc: Ganesan is a bus driver. Kousalya, the daughter of his boss, slowly falls for him. But she is shocked when she sees him being accused by a mentally ill woman who holds him responsible for her state.

programme.title: Movie - Darbar
programme.desc: Aaditya, the commissioner of Mumbai Police, sets out to catch Ajay, a drug peddler. However, he uncovers a deeper controversy linked to an international drug lord and must mete out justice.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The German Open is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Rot-Weiss Tennis Club in Berlin, Germany. 2025 will be the 98th edition. It is one of the oldest tournaments for women. With the venue’s centre court hosting up to 4,500 fans, this tournament acts as a preview for Wimbledon in both play and atmosphere.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025 Highlights
programme.desc: Catch all the best moments from the clay courts at the Foro Italico in Rome, Italy.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group D: Australia vs Colombia
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Libema Open has been home to WTA tennis since 1996. This outdoor grass-court tournament at Autotron Rosmalen is part of the WTA 250 level, with 32 singles players and 16 doubles teams competing in the city of ‘s-Hertogenbosch, the Netherlands.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Queen’s Club in London plays host to the HSBC Championships - with the tour returning to the annual tournament at the WTA 500-level after more than 50 years. The stunning outdoor venue in West Kensington is known for holding this long-standing annual grass court event, which was first played in 1889.

From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The German Open is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Rot-Weiss Tennis Club in Berlin, Germany. 2025 will be the 98th edition. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 12/13
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2012/2013 season.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode features part 1 of all the highlights from BodogFIGHT season two showing recaps and highlights of all the MMA scraps that took place in St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 5: Marseille, France - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Savate and the Martial Art of Hands and Feet with Masters Christian Robert, Frank May, Frederic Baret, Laurent Bois and Patrick Gellat.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Kotoshoho, Shodai, Takayasu and Takanosho.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Chris Arreola vs. Jameel McCline
programme.desc: This episode features a Heavyweight title bout between the unbeaten current champ Chris Arreola taking on the hard hitting veteran Jameel McCline, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge in the Big D to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles the Tilting Table and Ring Toss!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Okinoumi, Hoshoryu and Onosho.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. defeating Juan Manuel Marquez for career win No. 40, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.desc: Time's a-ticking when a seller brings a Mr. T wall clock to the shop. Will Rick and Corey see gold, or will they pity the fool? Rick checks out James Bond's credit card from the 2006 movie "Casino Royale".

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16) - EP 244

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 2

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 3

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2) - EP 4

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1) - EP 7

programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 83
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Marc Fennell takes us to Egypt, a remote Canadian island and London in a quest to unravel the mystery of a sphinx located in the British Museum that looks almost identical to those from Egypt - except it isn't. (Final)

programme.title: Dream Gardens S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: A beach loving Aussie family transform their flat building site in Portsea on Victoria's Mornington Peninsula into a modern Australian coastal garden.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 20
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 19
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Planet America (2025) - EP 20
programme.desc: Donald Trump attends the G7 Summit in Canada. Australia has been invited to attend along with the US, Canada, France, UK, Japan, Italy, Germany and the EU. Plus will we see a military parade to coincide with Trump's birthday?

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 95
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 122
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 122
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 122

programme.desc: It's salsa party time! Joining Adam is taco aficionado Daniella Guevara Munoz and homewares and hospitality connoisseur Kylie Javier Ashton.

programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Bullish with Sonali Basak
programme.desc: It's hard to imagine the capital of finance leaving New York, but Wall Street South is getting bigger every day.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: The Future of Racing with F1 Academy's Susie Wolff. Susie Wolff, the managing director of F1 Academy, chats about how she's helping more female racers try to advance into the ranks of Formula One.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: The College Sports Buzz With Georgia Tech's J Batt. Georgia Tech Athletics Director J Batt discusses the buzz around college athletics, including NIL and the transfer portal.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Intelligence
programme.desc: Bloomberg's Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney harness the power of Bloomberg Intelligence to provide in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.

programme.title: Why We Ride S2
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S2
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host._x000D_The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Samurai Drama "Keijiro's Diary 3" Eps. 8 (R)
programme.desc: The third season of "Keijiro's Diary," well-received from 2004 to 2007, is coming back for a rebroadcast. Six years have passed since Moriguchi Keijiro, a retired constable at the magistrate’s office, became the caretaker of a merchant's dormitory in Negishi. Keijiro feels the passage of time since losing his daughter, Michiyo, in a tragic incident before her wedding. Despite this, he continues to resolve consultations, spending his days close to people's hearts.

programme.desc: Dan Tae remembers his abduction after saving Gong Shim from a car accident. Dae Chul is arrested for attempted murder and Joon Pyo's kidnapping.

programme.title: Cheer Up - EP 11
programme.desc: Hae Yi is selected to partner Jung Woo and Sun Ho for a dating assignment. After dates with Sun Ho and Jung Woo, Hae Yi realises who she really loves.

programme.title: The Great Queen Seondeok - EP 26
programme.desc: A dramatic biopic of Queen Seondeok, the first queenin Korean history.

programme.title: The Haunted Palace - EP 6
programme.desc: Yeo-ri finds out that her first love became possessed and the palace is filled with evil spirts. She decides to use her shamanic power to save people.

programme.title: Running Man - EP 735
programme.desc: The must watch for K-Variety shows! In this "urban action variety", the hosts complete a series of obstacles and aim to eliminate each other to win.

programme.desc: Returning from abroad, Dr Xiao Yan (Yang Mi) carries the pains of having lost her fiancee as she works hard with Dr Bai Shu (Bai Yu) to heal patients that comes in to the emergency department of Tongshan Hospital.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. programme.title: Small Swallow Xiaoyan Night
programme.desc: Small Swallow Xiaoyan Night is a talk-show entertainment program hosted by Zhang Xiaoyan, the godmother of Taiwan's showbiz. The show invites singers, and celebrities to share their life stories and the inspirational story of their success.

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: A LIFE OF HIS OWN - EP 20
programme.desc: This drama revolves around Cheung Kit's journey as he grapples with his luxurious lifestyle. Through a series of romantic entanglements and conflicts with friends and family, Kit is forced to confront his own immaturity and the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: D.I.D. & What's On Today - EP 23
programme.desc: Eccentric detective Xing Kai and superintendent Ding Luofeng come from strikingly similar backgrounds, but have taken very different paths in life. A serial murder case brings them together.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2580
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline & What's On Today
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2582
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: D.I.D. - EP 25
programme.desc: Eccentric detective Xing Kai and superintendent Ding Luofeng come from strikingly similar backgrounds, but have taken very different paths in life. A serial murder case brings them together.

programme.title: Everlasting Longing - EP 25
programme.desc: Jun Qi Luo, the eldest daughter of a merchant family, disguises herself as a man to protect her family and business in a male-dominated society. She is exiled to Beixuan, where she faces hardships and must fight to reclaim her family's fortune after betrayal by relatives.

programme.title: Foodprint Tokyo
programme.desc: This show takes you to explore authentic Japanese cuisine and food culture in Tokyo, blending travel experiences with culinary adventures.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 14
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.desc: It revolves around cleaners, Eo Yong-Mi, An In-Kyung and Maeng Su-Ja, who are eager to change their destinies having overheard insider trading information at their company.

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 1
programme.desc: Through multiple time travels, modern-day bestselling historical author Shen Bu Yan (Guo Jia Nan) discovers Lu Yuan's (Zhang Ya Qin) deep patriotism and learns why she was misunderstood as the 'Demon Empress'. Determined, he sets out to clear her name.

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 18
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 17
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 6
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 14
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 19
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 20

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 21

His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 22

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 19
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 18
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 6
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 24
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Diary
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Winnie starts to regularly write a diary and indulges in her own imagination. She meets Ray who looks exactly like her ex-boyfriend one day and they quickly fall in love, but the relationship soon fades away. Is Ray no longer in love with Winnie or is it just her imagining that he wants a break up?

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Troublesome Night 4
programme.desc: This horror comedy consists of four short stories about a group of Hong Kong tourists who travel to the Philippines and encounter a series of paranormal events.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father...

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it...

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master's rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao's betrayal...

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue...

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the "Toad Stance" and accidentally unveils his true identity...

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu's disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master's Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan's daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan's friend along the way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous "Twin Swords" in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.
